Tried bull charge and bull market, both are flavorful, the broth is rich and comforting. The beef is not gamey at all. Itâ€™s a new noodle bar with cosy interior at Craig rd, Enjoyed our time there.

Iâ€™m staying at a hotel nearby and decided to give this place a try and Iâ€™m very glad I did. From the creative finance-themed concept to the warm atmosphere and, most importantly, the incredible food, this newly opened restaurant delivered exactly what I look for in a dining experience.

I ordered the signature â€œBull Marketâ€ dish and was blown away: the wagyu beef was tender, the noodles perfectly cooked, and the broth rich and flavorful. Chef/owner Abel was incredibly friendly and shared the story of his familyâ€™s culinary tradition, which made the meal even more memorable. While I donâ€™t live in Singapore, Iâ€™ll definitely be back the next time Iâ€™m in town.
